![](https://www.virtono.com/images/header-vps.jpg "")

 
## Deploy your new KVM VPS on our recently upgraded infrastructure, with new nodes that have the latest Intel GOLD CPUs, DDR4 Memory and multiple 10G Internet connections. 
## All Cloud VPS are available in the United States (New York, Miami, Dallas, Los Angeles) & Europe (Manchester, Frankfurt, Bucharest). 

-----------

Use **LET10OFF** coupon at checkout and save 10% lifetime. This coupon is available for [Cloud VPS](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps "Cloud VPS") services (starting from Cloud S plan and above), [Windows VPS](https://www.virtono.com/windows-vps "Windows VPS") & [Dedicated Instances](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-instances ""), not just for the offers posted here! It applies for monthly, quarterly and semi-annualy billing cycles. Yearly billing cycles are already insanely discounted.

**CLOUD VPS S** - **€3.55/month with coupon code "LET10OFF"**
**Insane discount on yearly payment:~~ €47.40~~ - €23.70**
Disk - 25GB SSD
Processor: 1 CPU
Memory: 1GB RAM (**FREE Double RAM, Just comment your order#**)
1 IPv4 Address
/64 IPv6 Subnet 
Traffic: 2TB @ 1gbps
KVM Virtualization


**ORDER NOW**: https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps

All VPS plans are **instantly** set up! Latest os versions from CentOS, Fedora, Debian, Ubuntu and others are available. You can also upload your own iso and install OS via VNC.

----------

The BIG Surprise: 

![](https://www.virtono.com/images/doubleram.jpg "")


**==> Comment below with your order number and we will double your VPS's memory. <==**

You can **double the RAM** for FREE for any [Cloud VPS](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps "Cloud VPS") services (starting from Cloud S plan and above), [Windows VPS](https://www.virtono.com/windows-vps "Windows VPS") & [Dedicated Instances](https://www.virtono.com/dedicated-instances ""), not just for the offers posted here, no matter the billing cycle. Just comment bellow with your order number and we'll get back to you ASAP. 

This is a limited offer, so you should hurry up in order to make sure that you get your server with double RAM! 

----------
